h3.a: Los Angeles County Public Health Order

div.div: Follow these easy steps to help prevent the spread of COVID-19

h3.a: Student and Staff Device Support Drive-through Service Update

div.div:
For the past three weeks, since the school closures were announced, PUSD staff has worked diligently to provide resources to those students and staff in need. Due to the current COVID-19 directives and to ensure the safety of our school families, staff members and their families, the Pomona Unified School District Student and Staff Device Support Drive-through Service will be closed until further notice. The Form will remain open, in order to ensure we are capturing District needs, however we encourage all to seek alternate means to access your instructional resources during this time of crisis. If and when we are able to physically re-open technology drive-through service, those on the form will be notified. If you have an issue that can be resolved through remote tech support, please call the Technology Helpline at (909) 397-4800 ext. 23780. Thank you.
https://forms.gle/gLr6ZPuJ316UpD478
Durante las últimas tres semanas, desde que se anunciaron los cierres de escuelas, el personal de PUSD ha trabajado diligentemente para proporcionar recursos a los estudiantes y el personal que lo necesitan. Debido a las directivas actuales de COVID-19 y para garantizar la seguridad de las familias de nuestra escuela, los miembros del personal y sus familias, el servicio de asistencia para estudiantes y personal del Distrito Escolar Unificado de Pomona estará cerrado hasta nuevo aviso. El Formulario permanecerá abierto, para garantizar que estamos capturando las necesidades del Distrito, sin embargo, alentamos a todos a buscar medios alternativos para acceder a sus recursos educativos durante este tiempo de crisis. En caso de que podamos volver a abrir físicamente el servicio de acceso directo de tecnología, se notificará a los que figuran en el formulario. Si tiene un problema que se puede resolver a través del soporte técnico remoto, llame a la Línea de ayuda tecnológica al (909) 397-4800 ext. 23780. Gracias.
https://forms.gle/gLr6ZPuJ316UpD478

h3.a: Results of LA County Science & Engineering Virtual Fair!

div.div: Congratulations to the following PUSD students who entered the LA County Science & Engineering Fair held virtually for the first time in the 70 year history of the event. Students had to submit a 3-minute video explaining the project and meeting virtually with judges to answer questions.

K-2 Resources: This video provides PUSD parents with an overview of Smarty Ants and how our K-2 Grade Children should be using it during school closures.
Este video para a los padres de PUSD informacion general de "Smarty Ants" y cómo nuestros niños de grados K-2 deberían usarlo durante el cierre de la escuela.

The overall theme for the student art calendar contest is "Water is Life" as it relates to the stewardship and conservation of water. The deadline for submitting artwork to the City of Pomona is Monday, May 11, 2020 by 5:00 p.m.
